note.p: Baptism: St Helen's, Bishopsgate, London (12 September 1710)
Death: Lamorbey, Bexley, Kent (08 or 09 August 1781)
References: John H Appleby, 'Robert Dingley, FRS (1710-1781), Merchant, Architect and Pioneering Philanthropist' in NR 1991 vol 45 pp 139-154, plate
Notes: DNB(MP) gives death date of 8 August 1781.
